body.section: This project provides infrastructure to build a rich client easier. There are many common best practices to build a server application. However, building a (complex) client application is not so easy to do. With mmm-client we offer you the perfect framework to do so. This includes the the communication with the server using mmm-service as well as everything you need to build a user-interface by mmm-client-ui. Have a look at our technical architecture to get started and also read the JavaDoc.
